findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is marked as external and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized approvals.

findings.title: transfer
findings.description: The _transfer function allows an attacker to drain the contract's balance by repeatedly calling it.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: _burn
findings.description: Potential burn vulnerability in internal _burn function.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in swap functions.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability in sync Function
findings.description: The sync function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks due to the external call.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize variables, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, which could lead to unauthorized access.

findings.title: removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: External function call with potential fee on transfer token vulnerability.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is vulnerable to fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee on transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks due to its support for fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: distributeTokenDividends
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in distributeTokenDividends function.
